0.p: Doctrine is very important in the Christian life. It allows us to divide falsehood from truth. Doctrine, of course, is a matter of the mind. But it is also a matter of the heart.

1.p: The reality is, it is absolutely impossible to free oneself from doctrine. Everyone believes certain doctrines, whether they wish to admit it or not, and everyone needs to be dilligent as to which doctrinal principles they will accept and which they will reject.

3.p: Even agnostics believe in certain doctrinal principles. They believe the doctrinal principle that humans can come to any particular doctrinal principles about God (save this one). Athiests, similarly, believe the doctrinal principle that there is no God, and thus every other belief about God is false.
